comment.author: 75421485@N08
comment._content: This is a bicycle race at the cycle track built by WGD Goff in what is now The People's Park in Waterford. Goff was a pioneer cyclist and motorist.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/75421485@N08] Thank you! Your excellent info added to description and tags.

P.S. Any idea on a date when the cycle track was laid?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 75421485@N08
comment._content: The cycle track was opened in May 1891.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/75421485@N08] Ahh, a good ten years before this photo was taken then. Thank you, Bob!
